original: Majjhima Nikāya 119
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Kāyagatāsatisutta
analyzed: kāyagata asati sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho sambahulānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṁ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
analyzed: atha kho sambahulānam bhikkhūnam pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantānam upaṭṭhāna sālāyam sannisinnānam sannipatitānam ayam antarākathā udapādi

original: “acchariyaṁ, āvuso, abbhutaṁ, āvuso.
analyzed: acchariyaḥ āvuso abbhutaḥ āvuso

original: Yāvañcidaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā vuttā mahānisaṁsā”ti.
analyzed: yāvañcidam tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena kāya gatā asati bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā vuttā mahā nisasā ati

original: Ayañca hidaṁ tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ antarākathā vippakatā hoti, atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṁ
analyzed: ayam ca hidam tesam bhikkhūnam antarākathā vippakatā hoti atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamaya

original: paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena upaṭṭhānasālā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
analyzed: paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena upaṭṭhāna sālā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi

original: Nisajja kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: nisajja kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā, kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti?
analyzed: kāya nuttha bhikkhave etarahi kathāya sannisinnā kā ca pana vaḥ antarākathā vippakatā ati

original: “Idha, bhante, amhākaṁ pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṁ upaṭṭhānasālāyaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
analyzed: idha bhante amhākam pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantānam upaṭṭhāna sālāyam sannisinnānam sannipatitānam ayam antarākathā udapādi

original: ‘acchariyaṁ, āvuso, abbhutaṁ, āvuso.
analyzed: acchariyaḥ āvuso abbhutaḥ āvuso

original: Yāvañcidaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā vuttā mahānisaṁsā’ti.
analyzed: yāvañcidam tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena kāya gatā asati bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā vuttā mahā nisasā ati

original: Ayaṁ kho no, bhante, antarākathā vippakatā, atha bhagavā anuppatto”ti.
analyzed: ayam kho naḥ bhante antarākathā vippakatā atha bhagavā anuppatto ti

original: “Kathaṁ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, kāyagatāsati kathaṁ bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahānisaṁsā?
analyzed: katham bhāvitā ca bhikkhave kāyagatā asati katham bahulīkatā mahapphalā hoti mahā nisasā

original: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu arañña gataḥ vā rukkha mūla gataḥ vā suññāgāra gataḥ vā nisīdati pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā

original: So satova assasati satova passasati;
analyzed: saḥ satas iva assasati satas iva passasati

original: dīghaṁ vā assasanto ‘dīghaṁ assasāmī’ti pajānāti, dīghaṁ vā passasanto ‘dīghaṁ passasāmī’ti pajānāti;
analyzed: dīgham vai assasantaḥ dīgham assasāmi iti pajānāti dīgham vā passasantaḥ dīgham passasāmi iti pajānāti

original: rassaṁ vā assasanto ‘rassaṁ assasāmī’ti pajānāti, rassaṁ vā passasanto ‘rassaṁ passasāmī’ti pajānāti;
analyzed: rassam vai assasantaḥ rassam assasāmi iti pajānāti rassam vā passasantaḥ rassam passasāmi iti pajānāti

original: ‘sabbakāyapaṭisaṁvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘sabbakāyapaṭisaṁvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
analyzed: sabba kāya paṭisavedī assasissāmi iti sikkhati sabba kāya paṭisavedī passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: ‘passambhayaṁ kāyasaṅkhāraṁ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayaṁ kāyasaṅkhāraṁ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati.
analyzed: passambhayam kāya saṅkhāram assasissāmi iti sikkhati passambhayam kāya saṅkhāram passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitā sarasaṅkappā te pahīyanti.
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ ye gehasitā sara saṅkappā te pahīyanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Evaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: eva bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gacchanto vā ‘gacchāmī’ti pajānāti, ṭhito vā ‘ṭhitomhī’ti pajānāti, nisinno vā ‘nisinnomhī’ti pajānāti, sayāno vā ‘sayānomhī’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu gacchantaḥ vā gacchāmi iti pajānāti ṭhitaḥ vā ṭhitaḥ asmi iti pajānāti nisinnaḥ vā nisinnaḥ asmi iti pajānāti sa yānaḥ vā sa yānaḥ asmi iti pajānāti

original: Yathā yathā vā panassa kāyo paṇihito hoti tathā tathā naṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: yathā yathā vā panassa kāyaḥ paṇihitaḥ hoti tathā tathā nam pajānāti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitā sarasaṅkappā te pahīyanti.
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ ye gehasitā sara saṅkappā te pahīyanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hoti, ālokite
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu abhikkante paṭikkante sampajāna kārī hoti ālokite

original: vilokite sampajānakārī hoti, samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī hoti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe
analyzed: vilokite sampajānakārī hoti samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī hoti saṅghāṭi patta cīvara dhāraṇe

original: sampajānakārī hoti, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti, uccārapassāvakamme
analyzed: sampajāna kārī hoti asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajāna kārī hoti uccāra passāva kamme

original: sampajānakārī hoti, gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hoti.
analyzed: sampajāna kārī hoti gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajāna kārī hoti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitā sarasaṅkappā te pahīyanti.
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ ye gehasitā sara saṅkappā te pahīyanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ uddhaṁ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṁ pūraṁ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu imam eva kāyam uddham pāda talāḥ adhas kesamatthakā taca pariyantam pūram nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati

original: ‘atthi imasmiṁ kāye kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco maṁsaṁ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṁ vakkaṁ
analyzed: atthi imasmin kāye kesāḥ lomā nakhāḥ dantāḥ tacaḥ masam nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjam vakka

original: hadayaṁ yakanaṁ kilomakaṁ pihakaṁ papphāsaṁ antaṁ antaguṇaṁ udariyaṁ karīsaṁ pittaṁ
analyzed: hadayam yakanam kilomakam pihakam papphāsam antam antaguṇam udariyam karīsam pitta

original: semhaṁ pubbo lohitaṁ sedo medo assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttan’ti.
analyzed: semham pubbaḥ lohitam sedaḥ medaḥ assu vasā kheḷaḥ siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttanti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, ubhatomukhā putoḷi pūrā nānāvihitassa dhaññassa, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave ubhatomukhā pūrā nānā vihitassa dhaññassa

original: sālīnaṁ vīhīnaṁ muggānaṁ māsānaṁ tilānaṁ taṇḍulānaṁ,
analyzed: sālīnam vīhīnam muggānam māsānam tilānam taṇḍulānam

original: tamenaṁ cakkhumā puriso muñcitvā paccavekkheyya:
analyzed: tam enam cakkhumā purisaḥ muñcitvā paccavekkheyya

original: ‘ime sālī ime vīhī ime muggā ime māsā ime tilā ime taṇḍulā’ti;
analyzed: ime sālī ime vīhī ime muggāḥ ime māsāḥ ime tilāḥ ime

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ uddhaṁ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṁ pūraṁ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati:
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu imam eva kāyam uddham pāda talāḥ adhas kesamatthakā taca pariyantam pūram nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati

original: ‘atthi imasmiṁ kāye kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco maṁsaṁ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṁ vakkaṁ
analyzed: atthi imasmin kāye kesāḥ lomā nakhāḥ dantāḥ tacaḥ masam nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjam vakka

original: hadayaṁ yakanaṁ kilomakaṁ pihakaṁ papphāsaṁ antaṁ antaguṇaṁ udariyaṁ karīsaṁ pittaṁ
analyzed: hadayam yakanam kilomakam pihakam papphāsam antam antaguṇam udariyam karīsam pitta

original: semhaṁ pubbo lohitaṁ sedo medo assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttan’ti.
analyzed: semham pubbaḥ lohitam sedaḥ medaḥ assu vasā kheḷaḥ siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttanti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitā sarasaṅkappā te pahīyanti.
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ ye gehasitā sara saṅkappā te pahīyanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ yathāṭhitaṁ yathāpaṇihitaṁ dhātuso paccavekkhati:
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu imam eva kāyam yathā ṭhitam yathā paṇihitam dhātuso paccavekkhati

original: ‘atthi imasmiṁ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū’ti.
analyzed: atthi imasmin kāye pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā gāviṁ vadhitvā catumahāpathe bilaso vibhajitvā nisinno assa;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave dakkhaḥ go ghātakaḥ vā go ghātaka antevāsī vā gāvim vadhitvā catu mahāpathe bilasaḥ vibhajitvā nisinnaḥ assa

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ yathāṭhitaṁ yathāpaṇihitaṁ dhātuso paccavekkhati:
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu imam eva kāyam yathā ṭhitam yathā paṇihitam dhātuso paccavekkhati

original: ‘atthi imasmiṁ kāye pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātū’ti.
analyzed: atthi imasmin kāye pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu uti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitā sarasaṅkappā te pahīyanti.
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ ye gehasitā sara saṅkappā te pahīyanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṁ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṁ ekāhamataṁ vā dvīhamataṁ vā tīhamataṁ vā uddhumātakaṁ vinīlakaṁ vipubbakajātaṁ.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu seyyathā api passeyya sarīram sivathikāya chaḍḍitam eka aha matam vā dvīha matam vā tīha matam vā uddhumātakam vinīlakam vipubbaka jāta

original: So imameva kāyaṁ upasaṁharati:
analyzed: saḥ imam eva kāyam upasaharati

original: ‘ayampi kho kāyo evaṁdhammo evaṁbhāvī evaṁanatīto’ti.
analyzed: ayam pi kho kāyaḥ eva dhammo eva bhāvī eva anatītaḥ ti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitā sarasaṅkappā te pahīyanti.
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ ye gehasitā sara saṅkappā te pahīyanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṁ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṁ
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu seyyathā api passeyya sarīram sivathikāya chaḍḍita

original: kākehi vā khajjamānaṁ kulalehi vā khajjamānaṁ gijjhehi vā khajjamānaṁ kaṅkehi vā
analyzed: kākehi vā khajjamānam kulalehi vā khajjamānam gijjhehi vā khajjamānam kaṅkehi vā

original: khajjamānaṁ sunakhehi vā khajjamānaṁ byagghehi vā khajjamānaṁ dīpīhi vā khajjamānaṁ
analyzed: khajjamānam su nakhehi vā khajjamānam byagghehi vā khajjamānam dīpīhi vā khajjamāna

original: siṅgālehi vā khajjamānaṁ vividhehi vā pāṇakajātehi khajjamānaṁ.
analyzed: siṅgālehi vā khajjamānam vividhehi vā pāṇaka jātehi khajjamāna

original: So imameva kāyaṁ upasaṁharati:
analyzed: saḥ imam eva kāyam upasaharati

original: ‘ayampi kho kāyo evaṁdhammo evaṁbhāvī evaṁanatīto’ti.
analyzed: ayam pi kho kāyaḥ eva dhammo eva bhāvī eva anatītaḥ ti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa …pe…
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa pe

original: evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṁ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṁ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṁ samaṁsalohitaṁ nhārusambandhaṁ …pe…
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu seyyathā api passeyya sarīram sivathikāya chaḍḍitam aṭṭhika saṅkhalikam samasa lohitam nhāru sambandham pe

original: aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṁ nimmaṁsalohitamakkhitaṁ nhārusambandhaṁ …pe…
analyzed: aṭṭhika saṅkhalikam nimmasa lohita makkhitam nhāru sambandham pe

original: aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṁ apagatamaṁsalohitaṁ nhārusambandhaṁ …pe…
analyzed: aṭṭhika saṅkhalikam apagata masa lohitam nhāru sambandham pe

original: aṭṭhikāni apagatasambandhāni disāvidisāvikkhittāni aññena hatthaṭṭhikaṁ aññena pādaṭṭhikaṁ
analyzed: aṭṭhikāni apagata sambandhāni disā vidisā vikkhittāni aññena hattha aṭṭhikam aññena pāda aṭṭhika

original: aññena gopphakaṭṭhikaṁ aññena jaṅghaṭṭhikaṁ aññena ūruṭṭhikaṁ aññena kaṭiṭṭhikaṁ
analyzed: aññena gopphaka ṭṭhikam aññena jaṅgha ṭṭhikam aññena ūru ṭṭhikam aññena kaṭi ṭṭhika

original: aññena phāsukaṭṭhikaṁ aññena piṭṭhiṭṭhikaṁ aññena khandhaṭṭhikaṁ aññena gīvaṭṭhikaṁ
analyzed: aññena phāsuka ṭṭhikam aññena piṭṭhi ṭṭhikam aññena khandha ṭṭhikam aññena gīva ṭṭhika

original: aññena hanukaṭṭhikaṁ aññena dantaṭṭhikaṁ aññena sīsakaṭāhaṁ.
analyzed: aññena hanu kaṭṭhikam aññena danta ṭṭhikam aññena sīsa kaṭāha

original: So imameva kāyaṁ upasaṁharati:
analyzed: saḥ imam eva kāyam upasaharati

original: ‘ayampi kho kāyo evaṁdhammo evaṁbhāvī evaṁanatīto’ti.
analyzed: ayam pi kho kāyaḥ eva dhammo eva bhāvī eva anatītaḥ ti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa …pe…
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa pe

original: evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṁ sivathikāya chaḍḍitaṁ—
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu seyyathā api passeyya sarīram sivathikāya chaḍḍita

original: aṭṭhikāni setāni saṅkhavaṇṇapaṭibhāgāni …pe…
analyzed: aṭṭhikāni sa etāni saṅkha vaṇṇa paṭibhāgāni pe

original: aṭṭhikāni puñjakitāni terovassikāni …pe…
analyzed: aṭṭhikāni puñjakitāni terovassikāni pe

original: aṭṭhikāni pūtīni cuṇṇakajātāni.
analyzed: aṭṭhikāni pūtīni cuṇṇaka jātāni

original: So imameva kāyaṁ upasaṁharati:
analyzed: saḥ imam eva kāyam upasaharati

original: ‘ayampi kho kāyo evaṁdhammo evaṁbhāvī evaṁanatīto’ti.
analyzed: ayam pi kho kāyaḥ eva dhammo eva bhāvī eva anatītaḥ ti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa …
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa

original: pe…
analyzed: pe

original: evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi …pe… paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu vivicca iva kāmehi pe paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So imameva kāyaṁ vivekajena pītisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati, nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
analyzed: saḥ imam eva kāyam viveka jena pīti sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati na assa kiñci sabbāvataḥ kāyassa viveka jena pīti sukhena apphuṭam hoti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, dakkho nhāpako vā nhāpakantevāsī vā kaṁsathāle nhānīyacuṇṇāni
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave dakkhaḥ nhāpakaḥ vā nhāpaka antevāsī vā kasathāle nhānīya cuṇṇāni

original: ākiritvā udakena paripphosakaṁ paripphosakaṁ sanneyya, sāyaṁ nhānīyapiṇḍi snehānugatā
analyzed: ākiritvā udakena paripphosakam paripphosakam sanneyya sāyam nhānīya piṇḍi sneha anugatā

original: snehaparetā santarabāhirā phuṭā snehena na ca pagghariṇī;
analyzed: sneha paretā santara bāhirā phuṭā snehena na ca pagghariṇī

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ vivekajena pītisukhena abhisandeti
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu imam eva kāyam viveka jena pīti sukhena abhisandeti

original: parisandeti paripūreti parippharati; nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa vivekajena pītisukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
analyzed: parisandeti paripūreti parippharati na assa kiñci sabbāvataḥ kāyassa viveka jena pīti sukhena apphuṭam hoti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa …
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa

original: pe…
analyzed: pe

original: evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā …pe… dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu vitakka vicārānaṃ vūpasamā pe dutiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So imameva kāyaṁ samādhijena pītisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati; nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa samādhijena pītisukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
analyzed: saḥ imam eva kāyam samādhi jena pīti sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati na assa kiñci sabbāvataḥ kāyassa samādhi jena pīti sukhena apphuṭam hoti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, udakarahado gambhīro ubbhidodako. Tassa nevassa puratthimāya
analyzed: seyyathāpi bhikkhave udaka rahadaḥ gambhīraḥ ubbhida udako tassa na iva assa puratthimāya

original: disāya udakassa āyamukhaṁ na pacchimāya disāya udakassa āyamukhaṁ na uttarāya disāya
analyzed: disāya udakassa āya mukham na pacchimāya disāya udakassa āya mukham na uttarāya disāya

original: udakassa āyamukhaṁ na dakkhiṇāya disāya udakassa āyamukhaṁ; devo ca na kālena kālaṁ
analyzed: udakassa āya mukham na dakkhiṇāya disāya udakassa āya mukha devo ca na kālena kāla

original: sammā dhāraṁ anuppaveccheyya; atha kho tamhāva udakarahadā sītā vāridhārā ubbhijjitvā
analyzed: sammā dhāram anuppaveccheyya atha kho udaka rahadā sītā vāri dhārāḥ ubbhijjitvā

original: tameva udakarahadaṁ sītena vārinā abhisandeyya parisandeyya paripūreyya paripphareyya,
analyzed: tam eva udaka rahadam sītena vārinā abhisandeyya parisandeyya paripūreyya paripphareyya

original: nāssa kiñci sabbāvato udakarahadassa sītena vārinā apphuṭaṁ assa;
analyzed: na assa kiñci sabbāvataḥ udakarahadassa sītena vārinā apphuṭam assa

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ samādhijena pītisukhena abhisandeti
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu imam eva kāyam samādhi jena pīti sukhena abhisandeti

original: parisandeti paripūreti parippharati, nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa samādhijena pītisukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
analyzed: parisandeti paripūreti parippharati na assa kiñci sabbāvataḥ kāyassa samādhi jena pīti sukhena apphuṭam hoti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa …pe…
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa pe

original: evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā …pe… tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā pe tatiyam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So imameva kāyaṁ nippītikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati, nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa nippītikena sukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
analyzed: saḥ imam eva kāyam nippītikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati na assa kiñci sabbāvataḥ kāyassa nippītikena sukhena apphuṭam hoti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, uppaliniyaṁ vā paduminiyaṁ vā puṇḍarīkiniyaṁ vā appekaccāni
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave uppaliniyam vā paduminiyam vā puṇḍarīkiniyam vā appekaccāni

original: uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake saṁvaḍḍhāni udakānuggatāni
analyzed: uppalāni vā padumāni vā puṇḍarīkāni vā udake jātāni udake savaḍḍhāni udaka anuggatāni

original: antonimuggaposīni, tāni yāva caggā yāva ca mūlā sītena vārinā abhisannāni parisannāni
analyzed: antonimuggaposīni tāni yāva caggā yāva ca mūlā sītena vārinā abhisannāni parisannāni

original: paripūrāni paripphuṭāni, nāssa kiñci sabbāvataṁ uppalānaṁ vā padumānaṁ vā puṇḍarīkānaṁ
analyzed: paripūrāni paripphuṭāni na assa kiñci sabbāvatam uppalānam vā padumānam vā puṇḍarīkānam

original: vā sītena vārinā apphuṭaṁ assa;
analyzed: vā sītena vārinā apphuṭam assa

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ nippītikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati, nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa nippītikena sukhena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu imam eva kāyam nippītikena sukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharati na assa kiñci sabbāvataḥ kāyassa nippītikena sukhena apphuṭam hoti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa …pe…
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa pe

original: evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā …pe… catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: puna capara bhikkhave bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā pe catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So imameva kāyaṁ parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena pharitvā nisinno hoti; nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
analyzed: saḥ imam eva kāyam parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena pharitvā nisinnaḥ hoti na assa kiñci sabbāvataḥ kāyassa parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena apphuṭam hoti

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso odātena vatthena sasīsaṁ pārupitvā nisinno assa, nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa odātena vatthena apphuṭaṁ assa;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ odātena vatthena sa sīsam pārupitvā nisinnaḥ assa na assa kiñci sabbāvataḥ kāyassa odātena vatthena apphuṭam assa

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṁ parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena pharitvā nisinno hoti, nāssa kiñci sabbāvato kāyassa parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena apphuṭaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave bhikkhu imam eva kāyam parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena pharitvā nisinnaḥ hoti na assa kiñci sabbāvataḥ kāyassa parisuddhena cetasā pariyodātena apphuṭam hoti

original: Tassa evaṁ appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato ye gehasitā sarasaṅkappā te pahīyanti.
analyzed: tassa evam appamattassa ātāpinaḥ pahitattassa viharataḥ ye gehasitā sara saṅkappā te pahīyanti

original: Tesaṁ pahānā ajjhattameva cittaṁ santiṭṭhati, sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati.
analyzed: tesam pahānā ajjhattam eva cittam santiṭṭhati sannisīdati ekodi hoti samādhiyati

original: Evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṁ bhāveti.
analyzed: evam pi bhikkhave bhikkhu kāya gata asatim bhāveti

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā, antogadhāvāssa kusalā dhammā ye keci vijjābhāgiyā.
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave kāyagatā asati bhāvitā bahulīkatā antogadhāvā assa kusalāḥ dhammāḥ ye keci vijjā bhāgiyāḥ

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci mahāsamuddo cetasā phuṭo, antogadhāvāssa kunnadiyo yā kāci samuddaṅgamā;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave yassa kassaci mahā samuddaḥ cetasā phuṭaḥ kunnadiyaḥ yā kāci samudda aṅgamā

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā, antogadhāvāssa kusalā dhammā ye keci vijjābhāgiyā.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāyagata asati bhāvitā bahulīkatā antogadhāvā assa kusalāḥ dhammāḥ ye keci vijjā bhāgiyāḥ

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, kāyagatāsati abhāvitā abahulīkatā, labhati tassa māro otāraṁ, labhati tassa māro ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave kāya gatā asati a bhāvitā a bahulīkatā labhati tassa māraḥ labhati tassa māraḥ ārammaṇa

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso garukaṁ silāguḷaṁ allamattikāpuñje pakkhipeyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ garukam silā guḷam alla mattikā puñje pakkhipeyya

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

original: api nu taṁ garukaṁ silāguḷaṁ allamattikāpuñje labhetha otāran”ti?
analyzed: api nu tam garukam silā guḷam alla mattikā puñje labhetha

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati abhāvitā abahulīkatā, labhati tassa māro otāraṁ, labhati tassa māro ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāya gatā asati a bhāvitā a bahulīkatā labhati tassa māraḥ labhati tassa māraḥ ārammaṇa

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, sukkhaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ koḷāpaṁ;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave sukkham kaṭṭham koḷāpa

original: atha puriso āgaccheyya uttarāraṇiṁ ādāya:
analyzed: atha purisaḥ āgaccheyya uttarāraṇim ādāya

original: ‘aggiṁ abhinibbattessāmi, tejo pātukarissāmī’ti.
analyzed: aggim abhinibbattessāmi tejaḥ pātukarissāmi iti

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

original: api nu so puriso amuṁ sukkhaṁ kaṭṭhaṁ koḷāpaṁ uttarāraṇiṁ ādāya abhimanthento aggiṁ abhinibbatteyya, tejo pātukareyyā”ti?
analyzed: api nu saḥ purisaḥ amum sukkham kaṭṭham koḷāpam uttarāraṇim ādāya abhimanthentaḥ aggim abhinibbatteyya tejaḥ pātukareyya ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati abhāvitā abahulīkatā, labhati tassa māro otāraṁ, labhati tassa māro ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāya gatā asati a bhāvitā a bahulīkatā labhati tassa māraḥ labhati tassa māraḥ ārammaṇa

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, udakamaṇiko ritto tuccho ādhāre ṭhapito;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave udaka maṇikaḥ rittaḥ tucchaḥ ādhāre ṭhapito

original: atha puriso āgaccheyya udakabhāraṁ ādāya.
analyzed: atha purisaḥ āgaccheyya udaka bhāraṃ ādāya

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

original: api nu so puriso labhetha udakassa nikkhepanan”ti?
analyzed: api nu saḥ purisaḥ labhetha udakassa nikkhepananti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati abhāvitā abahulīkatā, labhati tassa māro otāraṁ, labhati tassa māro ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāya gatā asati a bhāvitā a bahulīkatā labhati tassa māraḥ labhati tassa māraḥ ārammaṇa

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā, na tassa labhati māro otāraṁ, na tassa labhati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave kāya gatā asati bhāvitā bahulīkatā na tassa labhati māraḥ na tassa labhati māraḥ ārammaṇa

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso lahukaṁ suttaguḷaṁ sabbasāramaye aggaḷaphalake pakkhipeyya.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave purisaḥ lahukam sutta guḷam sabbasāra maye aggaḷa phalake pakkhipeyya

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

analyzed: api nu saḥ purisaḥ tam lahukam sutta guḷam sabbasāra maye aggaḷa phalake labhetha otāranti

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāya gatā asati bhāvitā bahulīkatā na tassa labhati māraḥ na tassa labhati māraḥ ārammaṇa

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

analyzed: api nu saḥ purisaḥ amum allam kaṭṭham sa sneham uttarāraṇim ādāya abhimanthentaḥ aggim abhinibbatteyya tejaḥ pātukareyya ati

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā, na tassa labhati māro otāraṁ, na tassa labhati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāya gatā asati bhāvitā bahulīkatā na tassa labhati māraḥ na tassa labhati māraḥ ārammaṇa

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, udakamaṇiko pūro udakassa samatittiko kākapeyyo ādhāre ṭhapito;

original: atha puriso āgaccheyya udakabhāraṁ ādāya.
analyzed: atha purisaḥ āgaccheyya udaka bhāraṃ ādāya

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññatha, bhikkhave,
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave

original: api nu so puriso labhetha udakassa nikkhepanan”ti?
analyzed: api nu saḥ purisaḥ labhetha udakassa nikkhepananti

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā, na tassa labhati māro otāraṁ, na tassa labhati māro ārammaṇaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāya gatā asati bhāvitā bahulīkatā na tassa labhati māraḥ na tassa labhati māraḥ ārammaṇa

original: Yassa kassaci, bhikkhave, kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā, so yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa
analyzed: yassa kassaci bhikkhave kāya gatā asati bhāvitā bahulīkatā saḥ yassa yassa abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyassa

original: dhammassa cittaṁ abhininnāmeti abhiññāsacchikiriyāya, tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ
analyzed: dhammassa cittam abhininnāmeti abhiññā sacchikiriyāya tatra tatra iva

original: pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane.
analyzed: pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, udakamaṇiko pūro udakassa samatittiko kākapeyyo ādhāre ṭhapito.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave udakamaṇikaḥ pūraḥ udakassa sama tittikaḥ kākapeyyaḥ ādhāre ṭhapito

original: Tamenaṁ balavā puriso yato yato āviñcheyya, āgaccheyya udakan”ti?
analyzed: tam enam balavā purisaḥ yatas yatas āviñcheyya āgaccheyya

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā so, yassa
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave yassa kassaci kāya gatā asati bhāvitā bahulīkatā saḥ yassa

original: yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittaṁ abhininnāmeti abhiññāsacchikiriyāya,
analyzed: yassa abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa cittam abhininnāmeti abhiññā sacchikiriyāya

original: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane.
analyzed: tatra tatra iva sakkhibhabbatam pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, same bhūmibhāge caturassā pokkharaṇī assa āḷibandhā pūrā udakassa samatittikā kākapeyyā.
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave same bhūmi bhāge catur assā pokkharaṇī assa āḷibandhā pūrā udakassa sama tittikā kākapeyyā

original: Tamenaṁ balavā puriso yato yato āḷiṁ muñceyya āgaccheyya udakan”ti?
analyzed: tam enam balavā purisaḥ yatas yatas āḷim muñceyya āgaccheyya udakam ti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā, so yassa

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, subhūmiyaṁ catumahāpathe ājaññaratho yutto assa ṭhito odhastapatodo;

original: tamenaṁ dakkho yoggācariyo assadammasārathi abhiruhitvā vāmena hatthena rasmiyo gahetvā dakkhiṇena hatthena patodaṁ gahetvā yenicchakaṁ yadicchakaṁ sāreyyāpi paccāsāreyyāpi;

original: evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci kāyagatāsati bhāvitā bahulīkatā, so yassa yassa

original: Kāyagatāya, bhikkhave, satiyā āsevitāya bhāvitāya bahulīkatāya yānīkatāya vatthukatāya anuṭṭhitāya paricitāya susamāraddhāya dasānisaṁsā pāṭikaṅkhā.

original: Aratiratisaho hoti, na ca taṁ arati sahati, uppannaṁ aratiṁ abhibhuyya viharati.
analyzed: arati rati sahaḥ hoti na ca tam arati sahati uppannam aratim abhibhuyya viharati
